docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
pyproject.template is template for making new python projects with all the bells and whistles, including:

  • Dependency management with poetry
  • Static analysis tools, including: ruff, mypy, vulture, and more!
  • Testing with pytest and coverage.py
  • Documentation with mkdocs

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: This project is open for contributions! You can do this by making a pull request.

docs.title: Developer utilities
docs.text:
This project provides a number of utilities for developers.

Note

Complete section

docs.title: get_greeting() -> str
docs.text:
Get a string greeting.

Source code in src/pyproject_template/main.py 
def get_greeting() -> str:
    """Get a string greeting."""
    return "Hello world!"

docs.title: main() -> None
docs.text:
Say hello.

Source code in src/pyproject_template/main.py 
def main() -> None:  # pragma: no cover
    """Say hello."""
    print(get_greeting())
